text: Reinier Honig (born 28 October 1983) is a Dutch professional racing cyclist riding for Team SmartDry. ==Major results== ;2000 : 1st 20px Junior National Road Race Championships ;2001 : 1st 20px Junior National Road Race Championships ;2003 : 1st Stage 3 Tour de Gironde ;2005 : 2nd U23 National Road Race Championships ;2006 : 8th Grand Prix Pino Cerami : 8th Ronde van Overijssel ;2007 : 1st Dorpenomloop Rucphen : 2nd Overall Vuelta a Extremadura : 2nd Ronde van Midden-Nederland ;2008 : 1st Circuito de Getxo : 4th Druivenkoers Overijse : 7th Kampioenschap van Vlaanderen : 9th Rund um die Nürnberger Altstadt : 9th Antwerpse Havenpijl ;2009 : 5th Gran Piemonte : 6th GP du Canton d'Argovie : 9th Overall Tour of Britain ;2011 : 3rd National Road Race Championships : 10th Tour de Vendée ;2012 : 5th Beverbeek Classic : 9th Druivenkoers Overijse ;2013 : 3rd World Ports Classic ;2014 : 3rd Race Horizon Park 1 : 7th Race Horizon Park 3 ;2019 :4th Overall Vuelta Ciclista a Costa Rica ::1st Stage 2 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch male cyclists Category:People from Heemskerk Category:Sportspeople from North Holland
title: Reinier Honig
